alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:16AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and southeastern Camden Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1214 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Fernandina Beach, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 30 to 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Cumberland Island and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
